name: Don't Crash! (itch) (Thura Soe)
description:
Inspired by the retro game, Lunar Lander, and made for the Untitled Game Jam #52.

Explore the space, avoid asteroids, and land on the fuel pods to refuel your vehicle. And most importantly, don't crash!

Safe landing tip: Remember to slow down your vehicle while landing on fuel pods.

________________________________________________________________________________

How to play

Press A and D, or Left and Right to control your spacecraft.
